pageTitle: London Underground Service Update - Metronet Strike Suspended Wednesday, September 5 - 1730hrs

title.title: London Underground Service Update - Metronet Strike Suspended Wednesday, September 5 - 1730hrs

texts: Tube services have resumed on all lines except the Circle line.
A Transport for London (TfL) spokesperson said:
"We are pleased the RMT has suspended its strike action at Metronet, following the clarification of all jobs and pensions issues.
"Passengers should check before they travel to see how Tube services are running.
"Our staff will be available to provide travel advice and assistance to customers and we hope to run a full service tomorrow."
The latest service update on all lines can be found at the end of this press release.
Passengers can check before travelling via the following options:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The TfL \u003ca href=\"http://www.tfl.gov.uk/\"\u003ewebsite\u003c/a\u003e ","The London Travel Info 24hrs telephone helpline: 020 7222 1234","BBC Ceefax, page 436, or ITV's Teletext, page 164","Information on posters at stations and information boards at Tube stations"]}
A summary of current service on London Underground follows:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Bakerloo line - good service","Central line - good service","Circle line - suspended","District line - services resumed between Whitechapel and Ealing Broadway; between Whitechapel and Putney Bridge and between Upminster and East Ham","East London line - services resumed between Canada Water and New Cross / New Cross Gate","Hammersmith \u0026 City line - services resumed between Hammersmith and Whitechapel","Jubilee line - good service","Metropolitan line - services resumed between Amersham and Harrow on the Hill; Uxbridge and Baker Street and between Watford and Baker Street","Northern line - good service","Piccadilly line - good service","Victoria line - good service","Waterloo \u0026 City line - good service"]}
